item.title: What is Tartan?
item.description: Tartan or checked weaving pattern has ancient origins. Perhaps it came with the spread of the ancient Bronze age Celts from Austria and Turkey. To the East there may be a link to the Tarim Mummies as was popularised by Elizabeth Barber1. This currently has got caught up in origin stories of the Han. Notable mummies are the tall, red-haired “Chärchän man” or the “Ur-David” (1000 BCE); who wore a red twill tunic and tartan leggings.
